name: Chronoclone
description:
Rewind time to clone yourself and solve puzzles in this minimalist puzzle platformer.

There are currently 10 levels in total, see how many you can complete!

Controls

A/D - Move left/right
Space - Jump
E - Rewind time
R - Restart level
Escape - Quit

Music credit

Relaxing Piano Music by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4273-relaxing-piano-music
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0

Made in less than a week for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2.

Note: the web version can lag sometimes, and only has a short loop of the music, download one of the builds below for a better experience and the full 24 minutes of music!

Note 2: unfortunately only 64-bit Windows is available for download because I forgot to change the build setting when I exported the 32-bit version, and I can't upload it until the jam ends.
